sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: God save the King. King Charles III was crowned on Saturday at Westminster Abbey in London, eight months after the death of Elizabeth II.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Archbishop of Canterbury placed a solid gold ruby-studded crown of St Edward on his head.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: His heir William then pledged his allegiance before Queen Consort Camilla was also blessed and crowned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Queen consort Camilla was also blessed and crowned. Both the outward King's procession and the return coronation procession took place in a typical London rainstorm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But it didn't dampen the enthusiasm of the crowd, with thousands of people from all over the world packing the two-kilometre route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The royal couple and serving members of the royal family then greeted the crowd from the balcony of Buckingham Palace before watching a fly-past that was scaled back due to the rain. Despite the rain, tens of thousands of people flocked to see King Charles and Queen Camilla for their coronation at Westminster Abbey.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Our correspondents met up with the fans of the British monarchy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The King and the Queen are now coronated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: People are very happy and enthusiastic here despite the rain. This is what they are saying.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was lovely to see everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: What can you say about today's procession and ceremony?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was beautiful, it was magical, it was a pleasure to be here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Well, we got ourselves a good spot, we could see everything. Yeah, I think I'm only going to be here once. Yeah, glad was beautiful. It was magical. It was a pleasure to be here. Well, we got ourselves a good spot. We could see everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Yeah, I think I'm only going to be here once. Yeah, glad we came.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Could you tell me what you pictured here?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I believe that is our new king and queen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says it shot down a Russian hypersonic missile over Kyiv on Saturday using newly acquired American Patriot defense systems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This marks the first time the country has been able to intercept one of Moscow's most modern missiles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In a telegram message, a senior Air Force commander called it a historic event, saying they intercepted a Kinzhal missile on the night of May 4th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Further east, Ukrainian special forces have accused the Russian military of using phosphorus munitions to gain control of the city of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: While Russian officials have not commented on the claim, they have rejected similar accusations from Kyiv in the past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: not commented on the claim, they have rejected similar accusations from Kyiv in the past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, in Moscow, police presence was reinforced ahead of the annual 9th of May Victory Day parade, which commemorates Soviet victory over Nazi Germany in World War II.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Kilic Tarolu has earned support from the other five-party leaders of the opposition alliance and mayors of two major cities, Istanbul and Ankara.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He is facing off against President Erdogan, a veteran politician who is seeking a third term and has been in power for 20 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, it will be his turn to hold a political rally in the old city. Heart-wrenching cries echoed as funerals were held in Serbia on Saturday

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: for some of the victims of two mass shootings that happened just a day apart this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The deadly attack saw 17 people killed and 21 wounded, many of them children. On Wednesday, a 13-year-old boy opened fire on his fellow schoolmates, killing eight students and a school guard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One day later, a 20-year-old man fired randomly in two villages in central Serbia, killing eight people. In response to the tragedies, the Serbian government promised a gun crackdown and increased security in schools.
